entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
